Description:
Never leave home again!!
If you have been looking for a family sized home, look no further. This genuine home was built with the family in mind, featuring lots of living space, large bedrooms and open plan living, so you have an opportunity to secure a pristine home for you and your family. Whether the kids are young or fully grown there is plenty of living to be done in a home like this; the teenagers will have their own fully enclosed rumpus room to keep them out of the parents hair, the parents can utilise the sitting room for a bit of peace and quiet without getting in the way of the central living area adjacent to the kitchen/family room. Where this property really comes alive, though, is the extras that very few homes have in Mandalay: of course it backs onto the golf course! But it also boasts a massive 898m2 allotment with huge fully enclosed undercover area, drive through access to the backyard and side access for the boat or caravan. The owners have thought of everything here with not a thing to be done: it is simply a case of moving in and moving on.
Why are so many people moving to Mandalay Beveridge? If not for the resort style living and facilities such as a swimming pool, gymnasium, restaurant and community centre, maybe it is for the award winning golf course? Maybe it is just for the lifestyle of community living within easy access to the Hume Freeway? Realistically, I would suggest it is the combination of all of these factors which are making people turn to Mandalay Beveridge for their next home.
Insights: 100 Mandalay Circuit, Beveridge VIC 3753 was last sold in 2020 and 23 other 4 bedroom house in Beveridge have recently been sold.

Description:
Call Michael Hajas - 0400 330 448 for another great result!
From the moment you lay eyes on this Dispaly Home you know this is going to be something special!
Upon entering it immediately welcomes you with its touch of luxury, style and comfort!
Perfectly positioned in a prime location within 'Waratah' Estate and directly within arm's reach of park-lands, sporting facilities, future shopping centre as well as within close proximity to schools, child care, shops, and public transport.
This stunning 4 bedroom home positioned on an impressive 512m2 allotment, it is sure to be the envy of all family and friends!
Beautifully zoned, this versatile floor plan emphasizes large scale gatherings with multiple living zones with an inviting blend of living spaces from inside to out.
Comprising of four large bedrooms, master suite with his and hers walk in robes, exquisite Ensuite with double vanities, all remaining bedrooms feature spacious robes, an inviting sparkling main bathroom, beautiful fully equipped kitchen with quality 900mm freestanding oven/cooktop and dishwasher, an abundance of cupboard and bench space with an impressive butler's pantry, adjoining a spacious open plan family living and dining area and completing the picture is a relaxing rumpus/theatre room where you will be able to spend wonderful family time together and entertain guests. A formal living area to the front of the home and a large study (or possible home office) are something to admire and add to the homes appeal and living lifestyle.
Stepping outside you will be welcomed by a beautiful undercover alfresco area with an impressive entertainers built in BBQ ready for the latest master-chef to show their skills and stunning/tranquil landscaped surrounds, creating the ultimate indoor/outdoor area for the kids and family to enjoy all year around!
Extras include - evaporative cooling, ducted heating, alarm, stone bench-tops, internal accessed remote controlled double garage and much more!

Description:
A Flawless Integration of Space & Family Comfort!
Be seduced by this quality built home which is sure to tick every single box on your must-have wish list. Luxurious living, completed by outstanding workmanship are words rarely strung together in a sentence about a home, but this is all that & more! Walk up towards its impressive grand facade & enter a home that is sure to impress with its vast living spaces, bright interior & warm family character & charm.
A flexible sun-drenched floor plan offering 4 great sized bedrooms plus study, stunning ensuite & well organised walk-in robe to main, spacious dual living zones with separate formal lounge, brilliant open plan family spaces perfect for large-scale gatherings & state of the art kitchen which needs to be seen to be believed & one to surely please even the most ardent chef. It hosts an abundance of cupboard & bench space & a sense of luxury for the connoisseur cook.
Step outside & be pleasantly surprised by the homes showpiece entertainers alfresco floored beautifully in eco decking which effortlessly links up to the home to provide the ultimate in indoor & outdoor integration.
Located to perfection a short stroll to a local park, schools, upcoming shopping complex, Craigieburn Central, transport & jam-packed with quality extras including high ceilings, heightened doors, ducted heating & evaporative cooling, double remote garage, roller shutters, stunning central bathroom, roomy laundry with great storage & much much more!
Homes like this do not come up often, so call now & be the proud new owner of this sensational offering.

Description:
Impressive Family Living
Situated in a quiet pocket of Craigieburn's most sought after locations & presented with love & pride, this impeccable home is sure to ignite your excitement. A fabulous decor, a bright & airy colour palette with a functional floor plan that complements an attractive facade & manicured gardens front to back.
It's smartly configured floor plan comprises a generous separate lounge, a fully equipped kitchen offering plenty of bench space & dishwasher which overlooks a spacious open plan meals & living area that effortlessly links outside to provide the ultimate indoor/outdoor integration. Sleeping quarters including 4 good sized bedrooms, master with walk-in robe & ensuite, & spacious central bathroom.
Step outside, fire up the BBQ & enjoy the home's perfect outdoor setting which provides peace & privacy whilst you entertain all seasons & even enough room for the kids to play out the back in complete privacy. Further features include a single lock up garage with drive thru access, ducted heating & split system cooling, tiles, 6.5kw solar panels, & so much more!
With its as-new feeling, this property is perfect for all first home buyers, investors or downsizers with its perfect proximity to local schools, shops & public transport.

Description:
Style, Comfort And Location
Set in an ideal and sought-after location in Craigieburn, this modern well-presented home has a lot to offer first homebuyers, investors or those looking to downsize. With a tastefully designed exterior you will be impressed with the open plan living which includes ducted heating & split system cooling, kitchen with stainless steel appliances & dishwasher overlooking the meals/living area, 2 great size bedrooms, main bathroom, double lock up garage with remote control entry and so much more.
Centrally located and in one of Craigieburn's most tightly held streets amongst quality homes & parkland. This home really does offer a blend of low maintenance living, without comprising on space or comfort and with all the amenities close by including shopping centres, public transport & schools. You be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long, inspection will not disappoint!!

Description:
Land & Location with an Eye to the Future!
In a quiet cul-de-sac with instant access to Aitken Creek trails & Craigieburn Gardens, this
single-level home occupies an impressively large allotment (approx 703m2) providing a lifestyle of immediate family function with options to renovate, rebuild or redevelop in the future (STCA).
Well presented throughout, the home's light & bright interior comprises 3 bedrooms (all with
built-in robes), central bathroom & separate WC. Add to this a versatile open-plan living/dining area accompanied by a neat kitchen with timber cabinetry & timber benchtops.
Other features include gas heating & split-system air conditioning, solid timber floors, security shutters & laundry.
Step outside to discover a wonderfully deep north-facing backyard with large storage shed
highlighting the property's generous dimensions & untapped potential, plus the added appeal
of a front carport. Walking distance to Bridgewater Road buses, it also offers easy access to major shopping centres, Craigieburn Station, as well as childcare centres, kindergartens, primary & secondary schools.

Description:
Quality, Class and Sensational Space
Premium features, flexible living zones and impeccable presentation highlight the appeal of this modern single-level home, delivering an exceptional family lifestyle in a popular Craigieburn neighbourhood.
Impressive interior showcases four spacious bedrooms, master with full ensuite & WIR. Additional 3 bedrooms- one with WIR & other 2 bedrooms with BIR, all serviced by a neat central bathroom & separate toilet.
Add to this a separate formal lounge perfect for some time out or a kid's play room. Walk out to the open-plan living/dining area and functional open-plan kitchen with sleek stone benchtops, stainless steel cooking appliances and walk-in pantry.
Other highlights include ducted heating, ducted evaporative cooling, alarm system, LED lighting, separate laundry, low maintenance front & rear yard and remote control double garage. Lifestyle excellence in a prime family-focused location, it's walking distance to public transport, schools and major shopping centres. Don't wait around, inspection is a must!

Description:
Scenic Country Lifestyle on 16.65 Acres...
Situated approx. 15 minutes to Melbourne's Tullamarine Airport & on the door step of the most liveable city.
Some say the hills are alive with the sound of Birds & the bees, flower & the trees, the moon up above & a thing called Ahhhhhhh ( Peace & tranquillity ).
This well-proportioned family home boasts a mix of modern and classic finishes, with 5 spacious bedrooms (main with retreat, updated en-suite and walk-in-robe) and a 5th bedroom / study or separate lounge, the flexible floor-plan allows for easy family living and entertaining.
Large in size the lounge offers panoramic views across this 16 acre property capturing the outdoor paved entertaining area & pool, the undulating surrounding hill sides/mountains, & as far as Mt Macedon Ranges.
Offering updated classic solid black wood timber kitchen with loads cupboards & bench space, generous double door pantry, European glass cook top & dishwasher, chefs oven which compliments the stone bench tops.
Conveniently located aside the dining area & flowing outside to your outdoor entertaining area with brick bbq allowing family & friends to enjoy the peaceful surroundings & beautiful sunsets this hillside home offers.
OTHER FEATURES.
- 16 Plus Acres of Undulating Hills & Panoramic Views, fresh country air & peaceful living
- Large Log Fire & Mantle Piece
- Views From Every Room In The Home
- Large Salt Chlorinated Solar Heated In-Ground Pool.
- 1.5KW Electricity Solar Panels
- Cathedral Ceilings.
- 50,000 Litre Water Tank.
- Large Amphitheatre Like Parcel Of Land & Hillside
- Approx. 35 km to Melbourne's CBD, having been voted the most liveable city several years running.

Description:
Location, Convenience & Lifestyle
Showcasing architectural flair, stylish décor, quality selections and a blue chip location in the heart of Mickleham Merrifield Estate.
Beyond the immaculate façade, you will be greeted by a welcoming entrance with wide hallway, complimented by quality fixtures and fittings. Families will appreciate the flexible accommodation options spread across the family area. Adjoining the dining is an ultra-stylish kitchen boasting stone benches, glass splash back and walk-in pantry offering plentiful storage and stainless steel BOSCH appliances including dishwasher, oven and gas cooktop. The home's lavish interior showcases a large master bedroom with fully-fitted WIR and luxurious private ensuite. Additional 3 bedrooms all with fitted mirror robes and equally-magnificent main bathroom.
Other stand-out features include ducted heating/cooling, comprehensive security system (alarm, CCTV and video intercom), double-glazed windows, custom lighting, stone benchtops and soft-close cabinetry throughout.
From the living area reveal a fabulous al-fresco entertaining deck with, plus a sunny backyard and internally-accessed double garage.
Close proximity to the area's upcoming schools, parks, shopping centres & bus stop right at the door step as well as easy access to Mickleham Road and the Hume Freeway. Inspection is a must!
Call us today!
Preet Brar 0416 085 144
Simran Khatrha 0431 178 435

Description:
Just Perfect!
Located in a very sought after pocket in Greenvale Lakes with easy access to Aitkin Boulevard and walking distance to the proposed Woolworth complex and Kolbe College. Comprising separate entrance with high ceilings and tiles running throughout, 4 good size bedrooms (master with full ensuite & WIR and all with BIR's), formal lounge, open plan living zone including great size kitchen Caesar stone bench top and s/steel kitchen appliances overlooking meals and family area with access to an outdoor entertaining area, central bathroom, separate toilet, good size laundry, side driveway leading to a spacious single garage (with internal access).
Fixtures & fittings including: ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm system, visual intercom, vacuum system, dishwasher, kitchen appliances, blinds, garden shed and much more.
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Beautifully zoned, the versatile floor plan emphasises large scale gatherings with 2 light filled living zones accompanied by an inviting blend from inside to out. You will find 4 bedroom accommodation comprising of an exquisite master suite with a large walk-in custom robe and ensuite. Strategically planned a lounge/kids' retreat in the garage.
Last but not the least, decent size backyard, with low maintenance gardens delivering the perfect serenity for private relaxation or family gatherings.

Drive through access from the double garage to a huge backyard suitable to park a boat, trailer or extra cars.
Including: Ducted heating, cooling, light fittings and window furnishings. Conveniently positioned, within walking distance to schools and close to Train station, shopping centre, parks, lakes and playgrounds.
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
A Craigieburn Gem.
With an abundance of natural light, spacious living and ample accommodation, this outstanding residence offers plenty of room for the growing family. Set in one of Craigieburn's most convenient locations and within close proximity to all the amenities Craigieburn has to offer, you will be enticed by this spacious family home set on 652m2 (approximately).
Just some of the features on hand include a separate formal lounge with bar, well-appointed updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances and dishwasher, meals area, family room and a huge backyard & alfresco area perfect for those who love to entertain all year round.
Additional features include master bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe, great sized bedrooms with built in robes, ducted heating & split system cooling, floorboards, landscaped gardens and a double remote garage. All this in prized location within walking distance to Craigieburn Station and Craigieburn Plaza this an opportunity not to be missed!

Description:
Family Flexibility with Amazing Outdoor Space!
Tucked away in a family-friendly cul-de-sac, this attractive home occupies an exceptionally large block (approx 672sqm) providing a ready-to-enjoy indoor/outdoor lifestyle along with
opportunities to further enhance or possibly sub-divide in the future (STCA).
Every room filled with natural light, the home's inviting interior comprises 3 bedrooms (all with built-in robes) complemented by a spotless central bathroom with double shower & separate WC. Add to this a spacious lounge leading through to the open dining area & adjoining kitchen with new oven, plus the added appeal of a full-size laundry, gas heating, ducted evaporative cooling, alarm system & motorised security shutters.
Outside, discover a large undercover entertaining patio overlooking the incredibly wide backyard garden with lush lawn area, handy workshop and large storeroom, as well as an oversized double garage (remote-controlled) & additional off-street parking.
Walking distance to Hothlyn Drive buses, primary and secondary schools, local parks & Aitken
Creek trails, it's also close to close to childcare centres & kindergartens, the convenience of Craigieburn Station & easy access to the Hume Freeway.
